Next, we need to determine who his grandson was. Richard III did have a grandson named Edward, but he was born after Richard III's death in 1485. Therefore, it is impossible for Richard III to have known his grandson.

Based on this information, the answer to the question is (B) no, Richard III did not know his grandson.
